name: Sodaman (Pepsiman Inspired)
description:
Sodaman is inpsired by the classic Playstation 1 game Pepsiman an action game where the superhero Pepsiman is saving a person who is dehydrated by giving them a can of Pepsi.

This was created as a challenge to see how a Pepsiman would look like if it was created for today's consoles like the Playstation 5.
Click here to see the video about the challange.

How to Play

Try to collect all the Soda cans and get to the end as fast as possible.
(POST YOUR HIGHSCORES!!)

Controls

Movement: A,D to move Left and Right
Jump: Space Bar
Slide: Left Ctrl
Boost: Left Shift
